-- Generated by CSharp.lua Compiler
local System = System
local ET = ET
local ETEventType = ET.EventType
local ET
System.import(function (out)
  ET = out.ET
end)
System.namespace("ET", function (namespace)
  namespace.class("AppStart_Init", function (namespace)
    local Run
    Run = function (this, args)
      return System.async(function (async, this, args)
        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.TimerComponent)


        -- 下载ab包
        --await BundleHelper.DownloadBundle("1111");

        -- 加载配置
        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.ResourcesComponent)

        ET.ResourcesComponent.Instance:LoadBundle("config.unity3d")
        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.ConfigComponent)
        ET.ResourcesComponent.Instance:UnloadBundle("config.unity3d")

        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.OpcodeTypeComponent)
        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.MessageDispatcherComponent)
        ET.Game.getScene():AddComponent(ET.UIEventComponent)

        ET.ResourcesComponent.Instance:LoadBundle("unit.unity3d")

        local zoneScene = async:Await(ET.SceneFactory.CreateZoneScene(0, 0, "Game"))

        local default = ETEventType.AppStartInitFinish()
        default.ZoneScene = zoneScene
        async:Await(ET.Game.getEventSystem():Publish(default, ETEventType.AppStartInitFinish))
      end, nil, this, args)
    end
    return {
      base = function (out)
        return {
          out.ET.AEvent_1(out.ET.EventType.AppStart)
        }
      end,
      Run = Run
    }
  end)
end)
